nodes.documentation:
@notice only can be called with a market contract address that currently exists in our whitelist
 this ensure's it is a market contract that has been created by us and therefore has a uniquely created
 long and short token address.  If it didn't we could have spoofed contracts minting tokens with a
 collateral token that wasn't the same as the intended token.
nodes.name: onlyWhiteListedAddress

nodes.documentation:
@notice only can be called with a market contract address that currently exists in our whitelist
 this ensure's it is a market contract that has been created by us and therefore has a uniquely created
 long and short token address.  If it didn't we could have spoofed contracts minting tokens with a

nodes.name: onlyWhiteListedAddress

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

params.isAttemptToPayInMKT: if possible, attempt to pay fee's in MKT rather than collateral tokens
params.marketContractAddress: address of the market contract to redeem tokens for
params.qtyToMint: quantity of long / short tokens to mint.

params.marketContractAddress: address of the market contract to redeem tokens for
params.qtyToRedeem: quantity of long / short tokens to redeem.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

setMKTTokenAddress(address).details: allows the owner to update the mkt token address in use for fees

setMarketContractRegistryAddress(address.details: allows the owner to update the mkt token address in use for fees

params.longQtyToRedeem: qty to redeem of long tokens
params.marketContractAddress: address of the MARKET Contract being traded.
params.shortQtyToRedeem: qty to redeem of short tokens

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

withdrawFees(address,address).details: allows the owner to remove the fees paid into this contract for minting

params.feeTokenAddress: - address of the erc20 token fees have been paid in

mintPositionTokens(address,uint256,bool).notice: Called by a user that would like to mint a new set of long and short token for a specified market contract.  This will transfer and lock the correct amount of collateral into the pool and issue them the requested qty of long and short tokens

redeemPositionTokens(address,uint256).notice: Called by a user that currently holds both short and long position tokens and would like to redeem them for their collateral.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

userdoc.notice: This collateral pool houses all of the collateral for all market contracts currently in circulation. This pool facilitates locking of collateral and minting / redemption of position tokens for that collateral.
